events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because the size does not fit me and I no longer need it.
The system classified the reported issue as a Refund request based on the customer's request to return the item for a money back.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Sarah, who specializes in handling refund and return requests.
